summary: A former criminal is drawn into a criminal endeavor and subsequently finds himself living an inexplicable new life working at a psychiatric facility.
cast: Paul Walker|Piper Perabo|Brooklynn Proulx|Bob Gunton|Lambert Wilson|Linda Cardellini|Tony Curran|Malcolm Goodwin|Ross McMillan|Aaron Hughes|Sean Skene|John Callander|Shawn Hatosy|Alex Sol|Peter Jordan|Tracy Beemer|Chuck Robinson|David Duncan|Richard Thomas|Frank Adamson|Ofield Williams|Mike O'Brien|Leigh Enns|Ty Wood|Steven Ratzlaff|Dan Skene|Susan Kelso|Manfred Maretzki|Aryanna Zamonsky|Lisa Durupt|Onalee Ames|Jessica Burleson|Cory Cassidy|Mike O'Brien|Warren Louis Wiltshire
director: Director: John Glenn (as John Patrick Glenn)
title: Proyecto Lazarus
